se3projecta.GUI
Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
  se3projecta.GUI.Transaction

public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object

Stores information about the current transaction; particularly what allocations of seats there are, which TheatreSession the transaction is for. Also contains many helper functions relating to the transaction; for example, methods which clear placed seats or return the total price of the transaction. The Transaction class can be subscribed to by sub-classing TransactionListener.
